# castle

**Type Property**

The point of interest category for castles.

## Declaration

```swift
static let castle: MKPointOfInterestCategory
```

## Historical and cultural landmarks

- **fortress**: The point of interest category for fortresses.
- **landmark**: The point of interest category for landmarks.
- **nationalMonument**: The point of interest category for national monuments.

items.description: The point of interest category for fortresses.
items.name: fortress

items.description: The point of interest category for landmarks.
items.name: landmark

items.description: The point of interest category for national monuments.
